translations: v.避免（avoid 的三单形式）；避开

sentences.sentence: He avoids any eye contact, quickly averting his gaze when anyone approaches.
sentences.translation: 他避免任何目光接触，任何人接近他时，他都会迅速转移视线。

sentences.sentence: This avoids "feature creep", in which requirements work remains constant or even increases.
sentences.translation: 这避免了“特征蔓延”，即需求工作保持不变甚至增加。

sentences.sentence: He avoids all meat and dairy products.
sentences.translation: 他不吃任何肉类和奶制品。
